Text: great quality and video, 15 minutes in on my ps3 and i got a piracy message and audio was cut off =(

@frosty1790. Assuming it's the cinavia (sp) protection. Something that's worked for me for other movies, is to go into the settings of your ps3 and change the date and time to the next day. You'll have to do it every 15-20 minutes. Better than nothing. Hope it works for this one as I'm downloading it as well.
